item.title: About
item.description: I have a masters degree in Transportation Engineering at Federal University of Ceará (UFC - Brazil) and am currently a research assistant at the Institute for Applied Economic Research (Ipea). I’m mostly passionate about data analysis with focus on data manipulation and visualization made in R.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Interactive webapps Fortaleza's (Brazil) Public Transport System (SIT-FOR) Shinyapp with routes, bus lines and general information about SIT-FOR Access to Oportunities Project Shinyapp with results of IPEA's project Access to Oportunities. Won honoroble mention at the Shiny Contest 2020. Made in partnership Rafael Pereira
